original_text: So listen to this. God says, “I will send prophets to you. I will also send to you people who know many things. And I will send people to teach you what is true. But you will kill some of these people. You will kill some of them on a cross. In the places where you meet to pray, you will hit some of them with whips. They will run from one town to another town, but you will follow them.”
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 너희에게 선지자들과 지혜 있는 자들과 서기관들을 보내매 너희가 그 중에서 더러는 죽이거나 십자가에 못 박고 그 중에서 더러는 너희 회당에서 채찍질하고 이 동네에서 저 동네로 따라다니며 박해하리라

sentences.original_text: I will send prophets to you.
I will also send to you people who know many things.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 많은 것을 아는 사람들도 너희에게 보내겠다.

sentences.original_text: And I will send people to teach you what is true.
But you will kill some of these people.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너희는 이 사람들 중 일부를 죽일 것이다.

sentences.original_text: You will kill some of them on a cross.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그들 중 일부를 십자가에 못 박아 죽일 것이다.

sentences.original_text: In the places where you meet to pray,
you will hit some of them with whips.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그들 중 일부를 채찍으로 때릴 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will run from one town to another town,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 한 도시에서 다른 도시로 도망갈 것이다.
